instruction: What is the most likely label for the mother's birth state code, assuming that the father's age at the time of birth is greater than 83?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: How would you quantify changes over time in birth weight in pounds if the newborn health score after 1 minute increases from 8 to 10 and the number of cigarettes smoked per day by the mother decreases from 26 to 24?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: Estimate how the number of alcoholic drinks consumed per week changes over time.

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: Can you identify anomalies in the data if the number of previous children who are now deceased decreases from more than 52 to more than 51, and the year the data was collected changes from earlier than 1974 to earlier than 1972?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.

mother_married.description: true if the mother was married at the time of birth; false otherwise.

mother_birth_state.description: Two-letter postal code for the state where the mother was born.

cigarette_use.description: true if the mother reported cigarette use during pregnancy. Available from 2003 onward.

cigarettes_per_day.description: Average number of cigarettes the mother smoked per day. Available from 2003 onward.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

alcohol_use.description: true if the mother reported alcohol use during pregnancy. Available from 1989 onward.

drinks_per_week.description: Average number of alcoholic drinks per week consumed by the mother. Available from 1989 onward.

weight_gain_pounds.description: Mother's weight gain during pregnancy, in pounds.

born_alive_alive.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now living.

born_alive_dead.description: Number of children previously born to the mother who are now dead.

born_dead.description: Number of children who were born dead (i.e. miscarriages)

ever_born.description: Total number of children ever born to the mother, including the current birth.

father_race.description: Race of the father. Uses the same coding as child_race.

father_age.description: Age of the father at the time of the child's birth.

record_weight.description: 1 or 2, where 1 is a row from a full-reporting area, and 2 is a row from a 50% sample area.

instruction: How should we classify the situation where the mother was married at the time of birth if the data source classification changes from greater than 1 to greater than 2 and the weekday of birth is less than 1?

source_year.description: Four-digit year in which the birth occurred (e.g., 1975).

year.description: Redundant four-digit year of birth. Matches source_year.

month.description: Month of birth, where 1 = January and 12 = December.

wday.description: Day of the week for the birth, where 1 = Sunday and 7 = Saturday.

state.description: Two-letter postal abbreviation for the state where the birth occurred. Not available after 2004.

is_male.description: TRUE if the child is male; FALSE if female.

child_race.description: Race of the child. Example codes: 1=White, 2=Black, 3=American Indian, 4=Chinese, etc.

weight_pounds.description: Birth weight of the child, in pounds.

plurality.description: Number of children born from the pregnancy. 1 = single birth, 2 = twins, 3 = triplets, etc.

apgar_1min.description: Apgar score at 1 minute after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

apgar_5min.description: Apgar score at 5 minutes after birth (scale 0-10). Available for births from 1978–2002.

mother_residence_state.description: Two-letter postal code of the mother’s state of residence at the time of birth.

mother_race.description: Race of the mother. Uses the same coding as child_race.

mother_age.description: Reported age of the mother at the time of birth.

gestation_weeks.description: Length of the pregnancy in completed weeks.

lmp.description: Last menstrual period (LMP) date in MMDDYYYY format. Unknown values may appear as '99' or '9999'.
